skuid__text.contents:
<style type="text/css">#header {
        width: 100%;
        postion: fixed;
        z-index: 10;
    }
    .fixed-header {
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%; 
    }
    .fixed-sidebar {
        position: fixed;
        top: 12%;
        left: 0.2%;
        width:25%;
    }
    .c_5364_5341 {
        display:block !important;
        text-align: center;
    }
    #Wizard_Principal{
        font-family: 'Hanuman';
    }
    .blackbackground{
        background: #000 !important;
    }
    .sk-page .c_19415_19399{
        display: none !important;
    }
    .c_1399_1382:hover{
        background:#444;
    }
</style>

<select class="header_select" id="main_menu" size="11" style="height:25vh;z-index:2;display:none;position:absolute;left:1%;background:#fff;"><option>Tax Preparation</option><option>Tax Planning</option><option>Sales Taxes</option><option>Payroll</option><option>Bookkeeping</option><option>HR</option><option>Business Registration</option><option>Tax Resolution</option><option>AR/AP</option><option>Document Preparation</option><option>Controller</option> </select>

<input id="filter" placeholder="Type to search" />
<style type="text/css">#filter{
        width: 90%;
        margin: 10px 20px 10px 20px;
        background: #f5f5fa;
        border: 1px solid #f5f5fa;
        border-radius: 5px;
        padding: 10px;
    }
    #filter::placeholder{
        color: black;
        font-family: 'Roboto Flex';
        font-size:13px;
        font-weight: bold;
    }
</style>

<input id="message" placeholder="Type to add something" />
<style type="text/css">#message{
        width: 100%;
        background: none;
        border: none;
        height: 32px;
        outline: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-family: 'Roboto Flex';
    }
</style>

DESCRIPTION INTAKE SELECTION DATA ENTRY AND PREP REVIEW STATUS
GENERAL      
State Assistance Needed No
Record tax advisor/accountant contact details No
Individual Tax Preparation No
Enter names, address and other important details No
Enter dates of birth No
Enter social security numbers No
Attach copies of last year's tax returns: No
Enter your bank account and routing number No
ENTER PERSONAL INFORMATIONS      
Enter Taxpayer Names {{Taxpayer_Condition}}
Enter Taxpayer SSN {{SSN_Condition}}
Enter Taxpayer Birthdate {{BirthCondition}}
Enter Spouse Name {{SpouseCondition}}
INCOME      
Select all relevant sources of income No
Attach your W-2 form No
Report your refund with form 1099-G No
Disclose income from investments No
Disclose rental income No
Disclose business income No
Disclose farm income No
Disclose financial benefits from health savings accounts No
Disclose gambling winnings No
Disclose alimoney income No
Disclose pensions and annuities No
HOMEOWNERS      
Complete your mortgage interest statement No
Deduct personal property taxes No
EDUCATION      
Deduct interest paid on student loan No
Deduct college expenses No
FAMILY      
Claim child and dependent care credit No
Claim credit for adoption expenses No
Deduct medical and dental expenses No
DONATIONS      
Deduct charitable contributions No
TAX DEDUCTIONS      
Deduct personal property taxes No
Deduct sales taxes No
Deduct foreign real estate taxes No
Other deductible expenses No
Claim work-related expenses No
Claim teacher/educator expenses No
Claim casualty and theft losses No
Claim legal fees No
BUSINESS TAX PREPARATION CHECKLIST      
Analysis Of Current and Past Financial Data: No
Collect copies of federal and state tax returns No
Consult copies of articles of incorporation No
Calculate year end balance sheets No
Review year-end bank statements No
Review gross receipts from sales or services No
Check sales records (for accrual based taxpayers) No
Calculate total returns and allowances No
Gather business checking/savings account interest No
Identify other income No
Benefits, loans and transactions documents: No
Compile details of fringe benefits No
Gather documents of business loans No
Gather records of all business insurance No
Locate information on interest expenses No
Document legal fees No
Payroll data No
Collect payroll forms No
List commissions paid to subcontractors No
Record wages paid to employees No
Expense details No
Collate all advertising costs No
Document all transportation and travel expenses No
Record office supply expenses No
Record rental expenses No
List any other expenses No
List of assets and depreciation: No
Disclose asset acquisitions No
Work out your depreciation expense schedules No
Document details of asset dispositions No
FINAL FORMS      
Review & finalize supplementary forms No
Attach final 1040 form No
Review your completed 1040 with a professional No
Schedule meeting with your tax advisor/accountant No
Make final adjustments No
Find any communications with the IRS No
Submit to the IRS No
Sources No
Related Checklists No
